list.name: Annotations & Alerts
list.rawQuery:
<your table>
| where $__timeFilter() 
| project TimeGenerated, Text=YourTitleColumn, Tags="tag1,tag2"

azureLogAnalytics.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms/map" 
| where Namespace == "Computer" 
| where Name == "Heartbeat"
| summarize max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, Status = Val
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, Status
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Namespace == "Memory" 
| where Name == "AvailableMB"
| summarize AvailableMB = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, AvailableMB
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Namespace == "Processor" 
| where Name == "UtilizationPercentage"
| summarize CPU = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, CPU
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize FreeSpacePercentage = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, FreeSpacePercentage
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize RootFreeSpace = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, RootFreeSpace
| join (InsightsMetrics
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
    | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
    | where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
    | extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
    | where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/mnt" 
    | summarize MountFreeSpace = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
    | where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
    | project Computer, MountFreeSpace)
    on Computer
| project Computer, RootFreeSpace, MountFreeSpace
| order by Computer asc

VMComputer
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| summarize MemoryMB=max(PhysicalMemoryMB), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, OperatingSystemFamily, OperatingSystemFullName
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| project Computer, MemoryMB, OSType=OperatingSystemFamily, OS=OperatingSystemFullName
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpaceMB" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize FreeSpaceMB = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, FreeSpaceMB
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Namespace == "Network" 
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond"
| summarize NetworkReadBytesPerSecond = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, NetworkReadBytesPerSecond 
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Namespace == "Network" 
| where Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond"
| summarize NetworkWriteBytesPerSecond = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(10m)
| project Computer, NetworkWriteBytesPerSecond 
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize ReadBytesPerSecond= avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, ReadBytesPerSecond
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize WriteBytesPerSecond = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, WriteBytesPerSecond
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "BytesPerSecond" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize BytesPerSecond = avg(Val), max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, BytesPerSecond
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "Processor" 
| where Name == "UtilizationPercentage" 
| summarize Usage=avg(Val) by VM=Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms/map" 
| where Namespace == "Computer" 
| where Name == "Heartbeat"
| summarize Readness=avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), Computer
// | where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
//| project Computer, Readness=Val, TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "Memory" 
| where Name == "AvailableMB" 
| summarize AvailableMB= avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "Status" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, Root= Val
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, Root
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "Status" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/mnt" 
| summarize max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, Mount= Val
| where max_TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| project Computer, Mount
| order by Computer asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize RootPartition = avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/mnt" 
| summarize MountPartition = avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize Root= avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| project Computer, Root, TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/mnt" 
| summarize Mount= avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| project Computer, Mount, TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize Read= avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| join (InsightsMetrics
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
    | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
    | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
    | where Name == "WritesPerSecond" 
    | extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
    | where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
    | summarize Write= -avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m))
    on TimeGenerated, Computer
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Read, Write
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "ReadsPerSecond" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
| summarize rootReadsPerSecond = avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
// | project Computer, rootReadsPerSecond
| join (InsightsMetrics
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
    | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
    | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
    | where Name == "WritesPerSecond" 
    | extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
    | where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/" 
    | summarize rootWritesPerSecond = -avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m))
    // | project Computer, rootWritesPerSecond )
    on TimeGenerated, Computer
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, rootReadsPerSecond, rootWritesPerSecond
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" 
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" 
| extend t=parse_json(Tags) 
| where tostring(t["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) == "/mnt" 
| summarize MountPartition = avg(Val) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Namespace == "Network" 
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond"
| summarize Sent = -avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Namespace == "Network" 
| where Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond"
| summarize Received = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Namespace == "Network" 
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond"
| summarize Sent = -avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
//| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated) 
| where Namespace == "Network" 
| where Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond"
| summarize Received = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
//| order by TimeGenerated asc
